title: Commercial Rev effect on soc econ 1650-1789

content.question:
Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.

Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze the impact of the major developments of the Commercial Revolution on Europe’s economy and society in the period 1650 to 1789.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
